T02D2953:32a-0: @32a * // dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2953:32a-1: gza' chen po brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur
T02D2953:32a-2: bar 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan
T02D2953:32a-3: pas gnas yid dang mthun par gza' chen po brgyad
T02D2953:32a-4: kyi dkyil 'khor bzhengs te sa'i cho ga la sogs
T02D2953:32a-5: pa sngon du song bas sa stegs gru bzhi ba
T02D2953:32a-6: la shin tu mnyam par bya ste /
T02D2953:32a-7: thig btab la tshon rtsi sna tshogs pas dkyil 'khor
T02D2953:32a-8: le'u tse dgu pa la so so'i mdog dang mthun
T02D2953:32a-9: ba sgo bzhi dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o //
T02D2953:32a-10: de nas bum pa dgu la so so'i mtshan ma btab la gnas su gzhag par bya'o //
T02D2953:32a-11: grva rnams su phur bu dang rdo rje skud pas sbrel la mkhas pas gzugs so //
T02D2953:32a-12: de ltar byas pa so so'i gnas su mtshan ma bris te /
T02D2953:32a-13: ngos bzhir rdo rje dang rin po che dang /
T02D2953:32a-18: nub tu zla ba'i mtshan ma /
T02D2953:32a-24: byang shar du sben pa'i mtshan ma bri'o //
T02D2953:32a-25: sgo rnams su lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dril bu bri'o //
T02D2953:32a-26: de nas so so'i sngags dang phyag rgyas sbyan drangs te /
T02D2953:32a-27: lag pa gnyis 'khor lo ltar byas la /
T02D2953:32a-28: aom na ma: tsanda badzra b'a na ye h'um zhes brjod pas /
T02D2953:32a-29: dbus su rnam 'joms sku mdog dkar po g-yas 'khor lo g-yon bum pa 'dzin pa /
T02D2953:32a-30: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bskyed do //
T02D2953:32a-31: lag pa g-yas pa bkan la padma'i tshul du bstan la /
T02D2953:32a-32: na mo ra ti bi ya sarba sva ta lha
T02D2953:32a-33: ta ka ra hi hi ka sv'a h'a zhes brjod
T02D2953:32a-34: pas / shar gyi bum pa la pa bsangs mdog
T02D2953:32a-35: dmar po rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bskyed do
T02D2953:32a-36: pas / // lag pa g-yon pa khu tshur bcangs
T02D2953:32a-37: la mthe bong dang mdzub mo sbyar te zla gam
T02D2953:32a-39: na ma: tsandr'a ya shi ta ha pra bha ba ma li ni sv'a h'a zhes brjod pas /
T02D2953:32a-40: nub tu zla ba mdog dkar po dang pa la
T02D2953:32a-41: zhon pa lag pa na padma thogs ba drung na
T02D2953:32a-42: bud med rda yab thogs pa bskyed do //
T02D2953:32a-43: lag pa g-yon ba'i khu tshur bcangs la /
T02D2953:32b-0: lag pa g-yas pa dam pa sbyin @32b pa'i tshul du byas la /
T02D2953:32b-1: na mo de ba gu ru bha ki sha ya
T02D2953:32b-2: sa ra sa tye na ha ga ri ri sv'a
T02D2953:32b-4: lhor phur bu sku mdog dkar po zla ba'i steng
T02D2953:32b-5: na 'dug pa dar ser po'i stod g-yogs gyon pa
T02D2953:32b-6: / lag pa g-yon pa na glegs bam thogs pa /
T02D2953:32b-7: g-yas chos ston pa 'dra ba bskyed do //
T02D2953:32b-8: lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs pa brang du bzhag la /
T02D2953:32b-9: na mo yu b'a r'a dz'a ya sarba satva pa tsa la ya sv'a h'a zhes brjod pas /
T02D2953:32b-10: byang du gza' lag pa mdog ser po rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
T02D2953:32b-13: padma'i gdan la 'dug par bskyed do //
T02D2953:32b-14: g-yas pa khu tshur bcangs la mdzub mo dang gung mo mtshan ma'i tshul du byas la /
T02D2953:32b-15: na mo bhu su ta rakta ma bya sri ya ga rta aa pa ra na ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2953:32b-17: shar lhor mig dmar mdog dkar po rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
T02D2953:32b-18: g-yas ral gri g-yon chad gri thogs pa bskyed do //
T02D2953:32b-19: lag pa g-yon bkan la snod kyi tshul du bstan la /
T02D2953:32b-20: na mo bhi sha ma ge'u smra shi dza li ta aa tsa sha sv'a h'a zhes brjod pas /
T02D2953:32b-21: lho nub tu sgra gcan mdog dud ka mi'i mgo
T02D2953:32b-22: la ro smad sbrul du 'khyil pa lus mig gis
T02D2953:32b-23: khengs pa / g-yas mda' gzhu g-yon rin po che'i snod 'dzin pa bskyed do //
T02D2953:32b-24: lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs la /
T02D2953:32b-25: mthe bong gnyis dang mthe'u chung gnyis brkyang ste /
T02D2953:32b-26: nam mkha'i tshul du bya ste /
T02D2953:32b-27: aom ma ka sho pa ya sv'a h'a zhes brjod pas /
T02D2953:32b-28: nub byang du nyi ma mdog dmar po rtal zhon pa lag pa gnyis padma thogs pa bskyed do //
T02D2953:32b-29: g-yas thal mo'i tshul du byas la na mo bha
T02D2953:32b-30: ting ga ma ma h'a y'a na ka sa sv'a
T02D2953:32b-32: byang shar du sben pa mdog nag po gos dmar
T02D2953:32b-33: po gyon pa g-yas ral gri g-yon zhags pa thogs
T02D2953:32b-34: pa bskyed do // sgo rnams su gzhan dang mthun pa'i sgom bskyed do //
T02D2953:32b-35: khyams rnams su rgyu skar rnams bskyed /
T02D2953:32b-36: de dag la dza: h'um bam ho: ye shes sems
T02D2953:32b-37: dpa' dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang
T02D2953:32b-38: gnyis su med par bstim par byas la /
T02D2953:32b-39: ye shes sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la dmigs te bsnyen pa bskyar ba ni /
T02D2953:33a-0: @33a * // de dag re re la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la /
T02D2953:33a-1: de nas mchod pa dang bstod pa bya ste /
T02D2953:33a-2: gza' brgyad rgyu skar dang bcas pa'i gtor ma la yang bstod do //
T02D2953:33a-3: de nas mchog gi bzlas pa brtsam par bya'o //
T02D2953:33a-4: so so'i bzlas pa bum pa la dmigs te /
T02D2953:33a-5: aom ma h'a k'a le be ga ra na aa dzi te /
T02D2953:33a-7: ti ti ti ti ting ga le da ha da ha te dzo ba ti /
T02D2953:33a-8: ti li ti li h'um phat sv'a h'a zhes pa re re la stong phrag re re bzlas so //
T02D2953:33a-9: gtso bo ni so so'i las dang sbyor /
T02D2953:33a-10: las su byed na gong ma'i so so'i snying po la khri phrag re bskyal la yang sbyar ro //
T02D2953:33a-11: dbang bskur na tha ma rnams kyis bya'o ;
T02D2953:33a-12: / brgya brgya'i bar du gza' rnams la p'u dza bya'o //
T02D2953:33a-13: dkar gsum mngar gsum gyis gza' rnams mnyes par bya'o //
T02D2953:33a-14: de nas slob ma rnams khrus byas te /
T02D2953:33a-15: gos gsar pa gyon la bskyed pa la sogs pa sngon du byas /
T02D2953:33a-16: dkyil 'khor du bcug ste me tog dor ba la sogs pa dang /
T02D2953:33a-18: de nas khrus byas la gza' chen po brgyad kyi ba lim gtang ngo //
T02D2953:33a-19: de'i 'og tu phyogs skyong dang bgegs kyi gtor ma sgra sna tshogs pa dang ldan pas btang la /
T02D2953:33a-20: dkyil 'khor bsdu ba dang bkra shis gsol ba la sogs pa bya'o //
T02D2953:33a-21: gza' chen po brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur
T02D2953:33a-22: ba'i cho ga nyi ma bcud len bya ba dpal
